ModMetaData.name: Avali Continued CE Patch
ModMetaData.author: Ksisa
ModMetaData.description:
Makes Eriss's and my Avali mod compatable with Combat Extended.
CE doesn't work with the Hacking mechanic, so it is turned off in this patch.
Load after the Avali mod (and after the Avali tweak mod if you have it). 
While it theoretically works with old saves, your weapons will not have ammunition and I reccomend to start a new save just in case anyway.
